items.sentence: I don\'t think that Tom and John are brothers.
I thought I\'d have another chance to do that.
I think that you\'re doing that the wrong way.
I think we shouldn\'t be doing this right now.
Exercise is the best way to get rid of stress.
Tom said you wanted to see me about something.
Tom sat at his desk all day crunching numbers.
Tom sat down at the piano and started playing.
Tom saw Mary kissing another guy at the party.
Tom said he isn\'t planning to stay very long.
You know what Tom said about Mary, don\'t you?
Tom wasn\'t exactly happy about what happened.
Tom told me that he wanted to change his name.
These artists are going to be famous some day.
These clothes are dirty and need to be washed.
These gloves should keep my hands warm enough.
What if someone killed Tom? What would you do?
Tom told me why he\'d decided to study French.
I\'ve never been to a French-speaking country.
The rumor is that they\'re going to Australia.
